Pre-Game Insights: Slovakia's head coach Francesco Calzona is set to line his side up in a 4-3-3 formation.
Juraj Kucka is expected to overcome fitness issues to feature in midfield.
Denis Vavro is nursing a slight thigh problem but expected to be in the XI.
Ondrej Duda is the leading goalscorer in the squad and will feature in midfield.
Ivan Schranz and Lukas Haraslin are set to operate alongside Robert Bozenik in the final third.
Martin Dubravka is the first-choice goalkeeper, and Peter Pekarik is in line to win his 128th cap.
